title: Eight journeys abroad /
author: Rosengarten, Mary D. Richardson
snippet: We land at five o'clock at Algiers and expect to spend the night at the St. George Hotel up on the hill. As we have not yet heard a word from you we are beginning to be anxious for our first letters.

title: Notes of foreign travel.
author: Bates, James Hale
snippet: Reached the George Hotel, Lichfield, at 1.30 p.m., and found a batch of letters from home. No ill news, save particulars of the terrible catastrophe in the Conemaugh Valley.
